Returns: a VolumeShaper object This value will never be null.
Parameters: VolumeShaper.Configuration: the @B_android#media#VolumeShaper#Configuration_E@ that specifies the curve and duration to use. This value must never be null.
Throws: if the configuration is not allowed by the player.
if too many VolumeShapers are requested or the state of the player does not permit its creation (e.g. player is released).
createVolumeShaper(android.media.VolumeS.Description: Returns a @B_android#media#VolumeShaper_E@ object that can be used modify the volume envelope of the player or track.

ClassDesc: VolumeAutomation defines an interface for automatic volume control of @B_android#media#AudioTrack_E@ and @B_android#media#MediaPlayer_E@ objects.
